description: Pomodoro Timer Mobile App - Simple, fast timer with presets, background operation, and lock screen widget

userStories.title: Initialize React Native project structure
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a clean React Native project setup to build the app.
acceptanceCriteria: Create React Native project with TypeScript template
Add AsyncStorage dependency for local storage
Add react-native-svg for circular progress
Project builds successfully on iOS and Android
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Create timer state management
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a timer state object to track duration, remaining time, and running status.
acceptanceCriteria: Create TimerContext with state: duration, remaining, isRunning, isPaused
Implement setDuration, start, pause, stop, reset actions
Timer decrements remaining time every second when running
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Build timer duration preset buttons
userStories.description: As a user, I want to quickly select a timer duration so I can start focusing immediately.
acceptanceCriteria: Display 4 preset buttons: 25, 30, 45, 50 minutes
Selected duration is visually highlighted with different background color
Tapping a preset updates timer display immediately
Default selection is 25 minutes
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Build circular progress display
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see my progress visually so I know how much time remains at a glance.
acceptanceCriteria: Circular progress indicator using react-native-svg
Progress depletes clockwise as timer runs
Digital time display in center showing MM:SS format
Progress animates smoothly (updates every second)
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Build timer control buttons
userStories.description: As a user, I want to control the timer so I can manage my focus sessions.
acceptanceCriteria: Start button begins countdown
Pause button stops countdown, preserves remaining time
Stop button resets timer to selected duration
Start and Pause are same button that toggles based on state
Stop button is separate and always visible
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Create settings screen with notification toggles
userStories.description: As a user, I want to choose how I'm notified when the timer ends.
acceptanceCriteria: Settings screen accessible via gear icon on main screen
Toggle switch for Sound ON/OFF
Toggle switch for Vibration ON/OFF
Settings persist to AsyncStorage
Load settings on app start
At least one toggle must remain enabled (prevent both OFF)

userStories.title: Add sound picker to settings
userStories.description: As a user, I want to pick my notification sound from device system sounds.
acceptanceCriteria: Sound picker shows list of available system sounds

userStories.title: Implement timer completion notification
userStories.description: As a user, I want to be notified when my timer ends so I know my session is complete.
acceptanceCriteria: Play selected sound when timer reaches 0 (if sound enabled)
Vibrate device when timer reaches 0 (if vibration enabled)
